about_the_game:
Take command in Starfall Protocol, a deep, expansive space-colony management game where every decision shapes your journey. Build and customize your starship, managing essential systems to support your crew in the unforgiving depths of space. Every character in your colony has unique traits, skills, and personal histories that evolve through your choices, creating a living, dynamic team.

Explore a massive, procedurally generated galaxy with millions of star systems and diverse planets. Land anywhere to gather resources, uncover secrets, or navigate the dangers of rival factions. Balance exploration, diplomacy, and survival as you upgrade your ship, craft advanced technology, and grow your colony into a force to be reckoned with.

Explore a massive, procedurally generated galaxy with millions of star systems and diverse planets. Land anywhere to gather resources, uncover secrets, or navigate the dangers of rival factions. Balance exploration, diplomacy, and survival as you upgrade your ship, craft advanced technology, and grow your colony into a force to be reckoned with.
name: Starfall Protocol
short_description: Starfall Protocol is a Starship colony sim with RPG adventures in a galaxy with millions of explorable planets!🌌
